messages.content: Hi, I'm having trouble with your mobile app. It keeps crashing every time I try to open the settings page.
Hello John! I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing crashes with our mobile app. I'd be happy to help you resolve this issue. Can you tell me which device and operating system version you're using?
I'm using an iPhone 13 with iOS 17.2. The app was working fine until last week when I updated it to the latest version.

Thank you for that information. This sounds like it could be related to a known issue with the latest app version on iOS 17.2. Let's try a few troubleshooting steps. First, can you try force-closing the app and restarting it?
I've tried that already, but let me try again... Okay, I force-closed it and reopened it, but it still crashes when I tap on Settings.

I understand. Let's try the next step - can you please delete the app and reinstall it from the App Store? This will clear any corrupted data that might be causing the crashes. Don't worry, your account data is saved on our servers, so you won't lose anything.
Okay, I'll try that now. Give me a few minutes to delete and reinstall the app.
Great! I reinstalled the app and logged back in. The settings page is working now! Thank you so much for your help.
Wonderful! I'm so glad that fixed the issue for you. The reinstall cleared the corrupted data that was causing the crashes. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again for the quick resolution!
You're very welcome! If you encounter any other issues in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
